metadata.description: suffix (max 10 characters long) that will be used to name the resources in a pattern like <resourceAbbreviation>-<workloadName>
Azure region where the resources will be deployed in
Required. The name of the environmentName (e.g. "dev", "test", "prod", "preprod", "staging", "uat", "dr", "qa"). Up to 8 characters long.
CIDR of the HUB vnet i.e. 192.168.0.0/24 - optional if you want to use an existing hub vnet (vnetHubResourceId)
CIDR of the subnet hosting the azure Firewall - optional if you want to use an existing hub vnet (vnetHubResourceId)
CIDR of the subnet hosting the Bastion Service - optional if you want to use an existing hub vnet (vnetHubResourceId)
CIDR of the SPOKE vnet i.e. 192.168.0.0/24
CIDR of the subnet that will hold the app services plan
CIDR of the subnet that will hold devOps agents etc
CIDR of the subnet that will hold the private endpoints of the supporting services
Optional. A numeric suffix (e.g. "001") to be appended on the naming generated for the resources. Defaults to empty.
Resource tags that we might need to add to all resources (i.e. Environment, Cost center, application name etc)
Default is empty. If empty, then a new hub will be created. If given, no new hub will be created and we create the  peering between spoke and and existing hub vnet
Internal IP of the Azure firewall deployed in Hub. Used for creating UDR to route all vnet egress traffic through Firewall. If empty no UDR
Defines the name, tier, size, family and capacity of the App Service Plan. Plans ending to _AZ, are deplying at least three instances in three Availability Zones. EP* is only for functions
Kind of server OS of the App Service Plan
mandatory, the username of the admin user of the jumpbox VM
mandatory, the password of the admin user of the jumpbox VM
Conditional. The Azure Active Directory (AAD) administrator authentication. Required if no `sqlAdminLogin` & `sqlAdminPassword` is provided.
Conditional. If sqlServerAdministrators is given, this is not required.

Conditional. If sqlServerAdministrators is given, this is not required -check password policy: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/relational-databases/security/password-policy?view=azuresqldb-current
set to true if you want to intercept all outbound traffic with azure firewall
set to true if you want to a redis cache
set to true if you want to deploy a azure SQL server and default database
set to true if you want to deploy application configuration
set to true if you want to deploy a jumpbox/devops VM

The URL of the Github repository to use for the Github Actions Runner. This parameter is optional. If not provided, the Github Actions Runner will not be installed. If this parameter is provided, then github_token must also be provided.

The token to use for the Github Actions Runner. This parameter is optional. If not provided, the Github Actions Runner will not be installed. If this parameter is provided, then github_repository must also be provided.

The URL of the Azure DevOps organization to use for the Azure DevOps Agent. This parameter is optional. If not provided, the Github Azure DevOps will not be installed. If this parameter is provided, then ado_token must also be provided.

The PAT token to use for the Azure DevOps Agent. This parameter is optional. If not provided, the Github Azure DevOps will not be installed. If this parameter is provided, then ado_organization must also be provided.
A switch to indicate whether or not to install the Azure CLI, AZD CLI and git. This parameter is optional. If not provided, the Azure CLI, AZD CLI and git will not be installed
A switch to indicate whether or not to install Sql Server Management Studio (SSMS). This parameter is optional. If not provided, SSMS will not be installed.
set to true if you want to auto approve the Private Endpoint of the AFD
Optional. It is not recommended that you use prefix by azure you should be using a suffix for your resources.
Optional. It is recommended that you specify a suffix for consistency. Please use only lowercase characters when possible.
Optional. Custom seed value for the unique string to be created -defaults to resourceGroup Id.
Optional. Max length of the uniqueness suffix to be added -defaults to 4
Optional. Use dashes as separator where applicable -defaults to true
Optional. Create names using lowercase letters -defaults to true
Optional. Used when region abbreviation is needed (placeholder value is "**location**)

properties.scriptContent: rg_name="$ResourceGroupName"; webapp_ids=$(az webapp list -g $rg_name --query "[].id" -o tsv); for webapp_id in $webapp_ids; do fd_conn_ids=$(az network private-endpoint-connection list --id $webapp_id --query "[?properties.provisioningState == 'Pending'].id" -o tsv); for fd_conn_id in $fd_conn_ids; do az network private-endpoint-connection approve --id "$fd_conn_id" --description "ApprovedByCli"; done; done
